transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Harsh ji sir, main bol rahi thi abhi main na aapko link de rahi hu sir please join kar lo taki main isko theek karwa du please. Bas do minute lagega jyada der ka nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Lekin main wo do minute ka theek hai lekin aap mujhe problem solve hona chahiye.
Executive: Are don't worry sir 24 ghante mein aapka soft problem solve ho jayega aur batao. Aao theek hai na.
Customer: Theek hai chalo theek hai. Kidhar share kidhar kar rahe ho aap?
Executive: Call pe hi raho aap mere to.
Customer: Lekin link kidhar share kar rahe ho aap? Mail pe kar rahe ho?
Executive: Mail pe hi karungi aap ruko to sahi.

Customer: Sir dekho aapke mail pe ek link aaya hoga IndiaMART ki taraf se. Mail ID batao na mujhe kaun sa mail ID kaha mera register?
Executive: Main aapko de deti hu. Call pe rahiye aap.

Executive: Aur main aapko na apna personal number bhi share kar deti hu taki aage se kabhi bhi aapko koi bhi dikkat ho na to aap directly mujhe bhi kabhi bhi call kar sakte ho. Theek hai, theek hai chalo. Ye wala jo number hota hai na sir har bar available nahi hota hai.
Customer: Barabar hai.
Executive: Isliye maine aapko jo link di hai wo di hai business.mogalwaterproofing@gmail.com. Ek second ha.
Customer: Haan.

Customer: Roshan Gupta barabar na?
Executive: Barabar.

Customer: Ye join nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Join nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Ya to phone kaat ke karo tab hoga.
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Main bol rahi hu hua dekho aapka number yahi hai na 99 karke?
Customer: Haan haan.

Customer: Ek bar apna number bolna sir.
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Apna number bolo number bolo apna.
Customer: 998
Executive: 998
Customer: 13
Executive: 13
Customer: 6950
Executive: 998136950. Barabar.

Executive: Dekho maine aapko whatsapp bhi kar diya hai link aap whatsapp se join karo. Pehle mujhe hi message karna tab link dikhega aapko.

Customer: Nahi whatsapp pe bhi nahi aaya kuch aapka.
Executive: Are sir aaya hai 998 136950.
Customer: Haan nahi ye ID ko dekh ke aane call chalu hai na to isliye nahi aa raha hoga.
Executive: Kya? Achcha theek hai main call disconnect kar du. Ek minute ruko sir ek baat suno aap apna mail ID to open karo mail ID se directly join ho jayega na.
Customer: Mail ID maine open kiya main kya bol raha hu mail ID open kiya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Mail ID pe aapka mail aaya hua hai usme join likha hua hai barabar hai.
Executive: Haan. Haan lekin nahi ho raha hai. Jab aap jaise meeting link se join now karke join karoge na.
Customer: Join nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Ye mail pe na dekho join now join with se Google Meet barabar hai.
Executive: Haan join with Google Meet karo.
Customer: Haan kiya maine kiya lekin tab bhi ho raha hai.
Executive: Kya ho raha hai start ho raha hai?
Customer: Start ho raha hai loading ho raha hai. [inaudible] bataati hu.
Executive: Ho nahi raha hai wo isliye nahi ho raha hai kyunki aap na call pe ho. Abhi aap kuch second mein main na ye call cut kar rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega ek minute call pe rahiyega.

Executive: Haan main bol rahi hu main na abhi aapki call cut kar rahi hu aap ab join karo call cut kar. Theek hai theek hai chalo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join meeting via link.



Resolution:

- Executive shared personal number.

- Executive shared link on WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested joining via mail ID.

- Executive suggested disconnecting call and joining.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will disconnect the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- link, meeting, whatsapp, mail
